2 days ago - The company manufactures a variety of products for the chainsaw, agriculture, forestry, and construction industries. Oregon Tool manufactures, markets, and distributes products primarily under two hero brands: Oregon and Woods Equipment.

s: The original Stihl chain was great....I filed it down to nothing. But I stumbled on these Oregon chains years ago. Honestly I will sharpen it a couple times each season as I need to, but I treat myself to a brand new chain every Fall and it's absolutely worth it to me.

For the over 75 years, the Oregon® brand has carved out a reputation as the undisputed market leader in saw chains, bars, sprockets, outdoor equipment accessories and parts, with more than 40 million products sold in more than 100 countries, from Sao Paolo to Siberian forests.
